body:
Comment 8: 
I don't really want to ship compilers that disagree about
something this fundamental and subtle.  I believe that
gccgo is in error given the current spec, but it is doing what
everyone seems to expect, so I sent out a CL that updates
the spec - trivially! - to define the gccgo behavior.
If this goes through I will update 6g.

http://golang.org/cl/5702062
